name: Space Junk [LD37]
description:
This astronaut found himself in the space junk room (theme "one room"). 

HOW TO PLAY: 

Keep the astronaut alive for as long as you can using ASDW/Arrows and SPACE. 

MAKING-OF:

I made this game for the LD37 compo although my goal was also to fit in what I normally do in a weekend, well, most of it anyway =) 

My blocks of hours for making this game was: 
Session 1: 5 hours (3am to 8am) 
... 
Rode motocross, cleaned the bike, Christmas shopping with family, playing with kids, ate out, got a hair cut, night time story for kids) 
... 
Session 2: 3 hours (9pm to midnight) 
... 
sleep, breakfast, clean house, play with kids 
... 
Session 4: 12 hours (3pm to 3am) 
Total Time: 20 hours 

Tools used: 
* Unity3D 
* Blender 
* Photoshop CC 
* Cubase 7.5 
* Sound Forge 11 
* Ozone 7 
* Fontstruct (I made the font using the fontstruct web site)  Game-Play Video Making-Of Time-Lapse Video Finding Bugs with My Son Video
